full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
### Project Title

Canada Requests Tenders for Garbage and Recycling Services at NB Armouries

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4387155268
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Publication Date:** January 25, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2024, 2:00 PM (local time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 1, 2024

#### Service Description

Canada invites eligible bidders to submit a proposal for the provision of garbage removal and recycling services at the New Brunswick Armouries. The contract will require successful contractors to remove and recycle garbage from the site.

#### Tender Requirements

* Bidders must have the necessary expertise and resources to fulfill the service requirements.
* The bid solicitation process will be conducted under rules of competitive bidding (concurrentielle - invitation ouverte à soumissionner).
* The successful bidder will be awarded the contract based on the lowest price criteria.

#### Debriefing Process

Bidders who are unsuccessful may request a debriefing within 15 working days from receipt of notification. This will provide them with an opportunity to understand the reasons behind the unsuccessful bid. Bidders should submit their request to the Contracting Authority.

#### Additional Information

* The Department of National Defence is the end-user entity for this contract.
* The tender notice can be accessed on the Ariba discovery platform (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18620536?extsite=MTg2MjA1MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
* The contract is subject to Canada's trade agreements, including the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and others.

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact the following:
Shawn Trahan, Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Tel: None
Email: shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Terms and Conditions

All tenders received in response to this notice will be subject to the terms and conditions set forth in the notice. Please refer to the notice URL for more information on the terms and conditions applicable to this contract.

#### Expiration

This tender opportunity has expired. ##### bid date: 2024-02-10
